title: After Marrying the Villain, I Became Popular - Novel Updates
tags: Black Belly   Comedic Undertone   Complex Family Relationships   Cunning Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Family Business   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Mysterious Family Background   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Showbiz   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: 甘洄
description:
Xia Wan has transmigrated into a book, and he has somehow become a cannon fodder who was ambushed by the protagonist in the novel.

When he transmigrated, he was in Slag Gong’s engagement banquet and was humiliated.

Xia Wan casually grabbed the tallest, handsome man in the audience and quietly asked for help.

In the silence, it was easy to see the almost top-quality man’s star-shaped eyes and a smile on his lips. He quietly hooked his arms around Xia Wan.

Later, Xia Wan discovered that the handsome man whom he held tightly was protagonist Gong’s brother, Huo Yu, the biggest villain in the book.>
